TopicTitle: Cowboy Bebop "Red Tail" flyable replica + video!

Articles.Content:
> 
> **K****OWBOY BEBOP**
> Hello once again everyone, Avera9eJoe here with something extra special.
> 
> I've been very busy as of recently (I had a migraine from sleep deprivation Yesterday. No worries I'm fine now ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)). but I've found the time to build another replica from my favorite anime, Cowboy Bebop. I hope you enjoy the Red Tail.

[**Embed broken? Watch here!**](http://www.twitch.tv/avera9ejoe/c/6454689)

<object type="application/x-shockwave-flash" height="378" width="620" data="https://www.twitch.tv/widgets/live_embed_player.swf?channel=avera9ejoe"><param name="allowScriptAccess" value="never"><param name="allowNetworking" value="internal"><param name="allowFullScreen" value="false"><param name="movie" value="http://www.twitch.tv/widgets/live_embed_player.swf"><param name="flashvars" value="hostname=www.twitch.tv&channel=avera9ejoe&auto_play=false&start_volume=25"></object>

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/ztAef)

[Red Tail (Dropbox)](https://www.dropbox.com/s/o1juwuedun90df3/Red%20Tail.craft?dl=0)

And as all episodes end,

***SEE YOU SPACE COWBOY...***

> 
> Impressive!

Thank you! I'm running out of ships to make though. The Hammerhead is the only small Bebop fighter left really. I'll probably make my own space fighter next. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Using the air intake as cockpit is a really cool idea.
